page.title: 12UPPER AND LOWER WEARDLEY
page.content: Residents in Upper and Lower Weardley include several families,a farmer and a gamekeeper.A typical family consists of a marketing manager,his wife and 2 children. They travel to Harrogate twice monthly,and Leeds and Bradford infrequently, shopping in Otley and Harrogate. The farmer travels into Leeds and Harrogate 3 times a week, while the gamekeeper does little travelling because his job is in the local area. He might visit Harrogate once a fortnight but hardly ever goes to Leeds and Bradford. Leisure time is spent watching T.V. and gardening.The gamekeeper's pheasants are featured on the T.V. programme "Emmerdale Farm". Residents agree that the main asset of the villages is their peacefulness.The drawback is the isolation.
